data.text: @Unusual_Times Before or after all the damage it causes?
@Unusual_Times Good question. Currently keeping their fingers crossed reinfections due to changes in virus. It was happening before Omicron turned up.
@Unusual_Times I think the current aim is to go for twice a year.
@durga_im @Unusual_Times That’s what they’ve been instructed to do! If they do or not? Who knows!
@durga_im @Unusual_Times It’s crap. Don’t have that option. Feeling so helpless.
@Unusual_Times #LongCovid is clinical imo. Just like measles can cause subacute sclerosing panencephalitis after 7-10 years.

@Unusual_Times Now we're back on my patch

Immunity to the point they will show no signs of illness - multiple times a year. #SARSCoV2 is much like its cousins in this.

It remains to be seen if subclinical issues are cumulative. Clinical symptoms likely are. 

Like in kids heading balls/rugby.
@durga_im @Unusual_Times But if the only precaution you can take is pull your child out of education then there isn’t much choice!
